title: Area Conversion
summary: Convert between square metres and square millimetres.
whenToUse: Use for area takeoffs when drawings use different units.
howToUse: Enter the area and select the conversion direction.
commonMistakes: Forgetting that square units scale by 1,000,000 when converting m² to mm².
siteTips: Keep larger units for clarity unless a detail requires mm².
verification: The converted number should be much larger in mm².
